def getAircraftTouch():
    data = request.get_json()
    aircraftName = data.get("aircraft")
    print("aircraft ISS ::: ", aircraftName)
    with open("data.json", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        data = json.load(f)
    aircraft = data[aircraftName]
    print(aircraft)
    return aircraft
